TextView.android:text: • Eat like a madman. This may even mean eating 3500-4000 calories a day. In fact, Mark Rippetoe even recommended that those who are underweight should drink a gallon of milk a day. Even the occasional cheeseburger is all right, as long as you are eating as much as possible. You should not, however, eat a bunch of empty calories, such as cookies, ice cream, chocolate, or chips. Eat things with nutritional value.

• Eat as frequently as possible and eat as many dead animals as possible. Try to get yourself some 97% ground beef and make yourself some hamburger helper. Remember: it's all about getting as many calories as possible.
